languages.text: {n}Алтарь украшен золочеными черепами, к их кости приплавлены металлические нити, некогда бывшие электротатуировками. Прежде величественный, ныне алтарь осквернен богохульными изображениями сине-зеленых солнц. Его рычаги и кнопки частично выломаны из гнезд, но механизм все еще прославляет своей работой {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссию{/g}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Алтарь украшен золочеными черепами, к их кости приплавлены металлические нити, некогда бывшие электротатуировками. Прежде величественный, ныне алтарь осквернен богохульными изображениями сине-зеленых солнц. Его рычаги и кнопки частично выломаны из гнезд, но механизм все еще прославляет своей работой {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссию{/g}.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The altar is adorned with gilded skulls. Threads of metal that used to be electoos are fused onto the bone. Once majestic, the altar has now been desecrated with blasphemous images of blue-green suns. Some of its levers and buttons have been pried from their sockets, but the mechanism still glorifies the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} with its operation.{/n}

Прежде величественный, ныне алтарь осквернен богохульными изображениями сине-зеленых солнц. Его рычаги и кнопки частично выломаны из гнезд, но механизм все еще прославляет своей работой {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссию{/g}.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Altar ist mit vergoldeten Schädeln verziert. Metallfäden, die früher einmal Elektoos waren, sind mit dem Knochen verschmolzen. Der einst majestätische Altar wurde nun durch blasphemische Bilder blaugrüner Sonnen entweiht. Einige der Hebel und Knöpfe wurden aus ihrer Verankerung gerissen, doch der Mechanismus verherrlicht durch seinen Betrieb weiterhin den {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The altar is adorned with gilded skulls. Threads of metal that used to be electoos are fused onto the bone. Once majestic, the altar has now been desecrated with blasphemous images of blue-green suns. Some of its levers and buttons have been pried from their sockets, but the mechanism still glorifies the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} with its operation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Altar ist mit vergoldeten Schädeln verziert. Metallfäden, die früher einmal Elektoos waren, sind mit dem Knochen verschmolzen. Der einst majestätische Altar wurde nun durch blasphemische Bilder blaugrüner Sonnen entweiht. Einige der Hebel und Knöpfe wurden aus ihrer Verankerung gerissen, doch der Mechanismus verherrlicht durch seinen Betrieb weiterhin den {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}.{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'autel est décoré de crânes dorés. Des fils métalliques, sans doute d'anciens électrotatouages, ont fusionné avec les ossements. Autrefois majestueux, l'autel a désormais été souillé d'images blasphématoires de soleils bleu-vert. Bien que certains de ses leviers et boutons aient été retirés de leurs logements, le mécanisme glorifie l'{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnimessie{/g} en continuant de fonctionner.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The altar is adorned with gilded skulls. Threads of metal that used to be electoos are fused onto the bone. Once majestic, the altar has now been desecrated with blasphemous images of blue-green suns. Some of its levers and buttons have been pried from their sockets, but the mechanism still glorifies the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} with its operation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'autel est décoré de crânes dorés. Des fils métalliques, sans doute d'anciens électrotatouages, ont fusionné avec les ossements. Autrefois majestueux, l'autel a désormais été souillé d'images blasphématoires de soleils bleu-vert. Bien que certains de ses leviers et boutons aient été retirés de leurs logements, le mécanisme glorifie l'{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnimessie{/g} en continuant de fonctionner.{/n}

languages.text: {n}祭坛上装饰着镀金的颅骨，原本用作电镀体的金属线被熔合在骨头上。这座雄伟的祭坛，如今画满了亵渎意味的蓝绿色太阳图案。部分拉杆与按钮已经被撬了出来，但这台装置依然在运转，继续侍奉{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}欧姆尼塞亚{/g}的荣光。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The altar is adorned with gilded skulls. Threads of metal that used to be electoos are fused onto the bone. Once majestic, the altar has now been desecrated with blasphemous images of blue-green suns. Some of its levers and buttons have been pried from their sockets, but the mechanism still glorifies the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} with its operation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}祭坛上装饰着镀金的颅骨，原本用作电镀体的金属线被熔合在骨头上。这座雄伟的祭坛，如今画满了亵渎意味的蓝绿色太阳图案。部分拉杆与按钮已经被撬了出来，但这台装置依然在运转，继续侍奉{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}欧姆尼塞亚{/g}的荣光。{/n}

languages.text: {n}祭壇は金色の頭蓋骨で飾られている。かつてはエレクトゥーだった金属の細い線が骨に融合していた。かつては威厳のあった祭壇は、今や青緑の太陽という冒涜的な姿で神を汚している。レバーとボタンがいくつかソケットから取り外されているものの、機械はまだ稼働して{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}万機神{/g}を讃えている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The altar is adorned with gilded skulls. Threads of metal that used to be electoos are fused onto the bone. Once majestic, the altar has now been desecrated with blasphemous images of blue-green suns. Some of its levers and buttons have been pried from their sockets, but the mechanism still glorifies the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} with its operation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}祭壇は金色の頭蓋骨で飾られている。かつてはエレクトゥーだった金属の細い線が骨に融合していた。前まで威厳のあった祭壇は、今や青緑の太陽という冒涜的な姿で神を汚す。レバーとボタンがいくつかソケットから取り外されているものの、機械はまだ稼働して{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}万機神{/g}を讃えている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El altar está adornado con calaveras doradas. Los hilos de metal que antes eran electoos se fusionan sobre el hueso. Antaño majestuoso, el altar ha sido profanado con imágenes blasfemas de soles azul verdosos. Algunas de sus palancas y botones han sido arrancados de sus huecos, pero el mecanismo sigue glorificando al {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} con su funcionamiento.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The altar is adorned with gilded skulls. Threads of metal that used to be electoos are fused onto the bone. Once majestic, the altar has now been desecrated with blasphemous images of blue-green suns. Some of its levers and buttons have been pried from their sockets, but the mechanism still glorifies the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} with its operation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El altar está adornado con calaveras doradas. Los hilos de metal que antes eran electoos se fusionan sobre el hueso. Antaño majestuoso, el altar ha sido profanado con imágenes blasfemas de soles azul verdosos. Algunas de sus palancas y botones han sido arrancados de sus huecos, pero el mecanismo sigue glorificando al {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} con su funcionamiento.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sunak, yaldızlı kafataslarıyla süslenmiş. Elektrodövme vasfını yitirmiş metal şeritlerse kemikle bütünleşmiş. İhtişamını kaybetmiş sunakta artık mavi yeşil güneşler gibi kâfirce görseller boy gösteriyor. Bazı kol ve düğmeler yerlerinden sökülmüş ancak mekanizma işlevselliğini yitirmeyerek inatla {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Hermesih'i{/g} ululamaya devam ediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The altar is adorned with gilded skulls. Threads of metal that used to be electoos are fused onto the bone. Once majestic, the altar has now been desecrated with blasphemous images of blue-green suns. Some of its levers and buttons have been pried from their sockets, but the mechanism still glorifies the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} with its operation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sunak, yaldızlı kafataslarıyla süslenmiş. Elektrodövme vasfını yitirmiş metal aksanlarsa kemikle bütünleşmiş. İhtişamını kaybetmiş sunakta artık mavi yeşil güneşler gibi kâfirce görseller boy gösteriyor. Bazı kollar ve düğmeler yerlerinden sökülmüş ancak mekanizma, doğası gereği {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Hermesih{/g}'i methetmeye devam ediyor.{/n}
